name: Astro A10 Gen 2
description: The Logitech Astro A10 v2 is a versatile gaming headset designed for multi-platform use, including PC, Mac, PlayStation, and Xbox. It features 40 mm drivers delivering a frequency response from 20 Hz to 20 kHz, ensuring clear and immersive audio across various gaming environments. With its durable build and comfortable fit, it's suitable for long gaming sessions. The headset includes a unidirectional microphone with a flip-to-mute function, ensuring clear communication with teammates. Wired connectivity via a 3.5mm audio jack provides reliable performance, and the headset is lightweight despite its robust construction, making it a practical choice for both casual and competitive gamers.
technical_specifications: Type: Gaming headset, Compatibility: PC / Mac / PlayStation / Xbox, Driver Size: 40 mm, Frequency Response: 20 Hz - 20 kHz, Impedance: 32 ohms, Sensitivity: 100 dB SPL/mW, Microphone: Yes (unidirectional flip-to-mute mic), Connectivity: Wired, 3.5mm audio jack, Cable Length: 6.5 ft (2 m), Weight: 346 g

name: Core i3-10100F 4C/8T (Needs GPU)
description:
The Intel Core i3-10100F is a 10th generation processor designed to deliver reliable and efficient performance for everyday tasks and basic gaming. With a 4-core, 8-thread configuration, this CPU provides an optimal balance between performance and cost. With a base frequency of 3.6 GHz and a turbo boost of up to 4.3 GHz, it is capable of handling multitasking applications and light gaming with ease.

Key features:

Cores / Threads: 4C / 8T
Base frequency: 3.6 GHz
Turbo frequency: Up to 4.3 GHz
Cache: 6 MB Intel Smart Cache
Compatibility: Socket LGA 1200
TDP: 65W
Memory: DDR4 support up to 2666 MHz

This processor requires a dedicated graphics card, as it does not include integrated graphics. It is an ideal choice for those looking to upgrade their system without compromising on budget, offering solid performance for a wide range of everyday applications and basic gaming.
technical_specifications: Processor: Intel Core i3-10100F, Cores: 4, Threads: 8, Base Clock Speed: 3.6 GHz, Max Boost Clock Speed: 4.3 GHz, Cache: 6 MB, TDP: 65 W, Integrated Graphics: None (need GPU), Socket: LGA 1200, Architecture: Comet Lake

name: A22 FHD 22P 75Hz HDMI VGA
description: The Xiaomi A22 FHD 22P 75Hz monitor is a versatile display designed for both home and office use. It features a 22-inch IPS panel that delivers vibrant colors and wide viewing angles, ensuring consistent image quality from different perspectives. With a Full HD resolution of 1920 x 1080 pixels, it provides sharp and clear visuals, ideal for both productivity tasks and entertainment. The 75Hz refresh rate offers a smoother experience compared to standard 60Hz monitors, making it suitable for casual gaming and video playback. Connectivity options include HDMI and VGA ports, allowing compatibility with a wide range of devices. The monitor's stand is tilt-adjustable for ergonomic comfort, and it supports VESA mounting for flexible placement. With its sleek design and reliable performance, the Xiaomi A22 FHD 22P is a great choice for an affordable and high-quality monitor.

name: USB Condenser Yeti
description: The Blue Yeti USB Condenser Microphone is a versatile and high-quality microphone designed for a variety of applications, including podcasting, streaming, voiceovers, and music recording. It features a tri-capsule array that allows for four different pickup patterns: cardioid, bidirectional, omnidirectional, and stereo. The microphone delivers crystal-clear, studio-quality sound and offers user-friendly controls for volume, pattern selection, mute, and microphone gain. Its plug-and-play functionality ensures easy setup with both Windows and Mac computers.

name: GeForce RTX 3080 12GB VRAM
description: The RTX 3080 is based on NVIDIA's Ampere architecture, offering significant improvements in performance and efficiency compared to its predecessor, the RTX 2080. It features a large number of CUDA cores (stream processors) and utilizes second-generation RT cores and third-generation Tensor cores for real-time ray tracing and AI-powered features, respectively. The card supports DirectX 12 Ultimate and includes hardware-accelerated ray tracing and AI capabilities, making it suitable for both gaming and professional applications like 3D rendering and machine learning. It boasts excellent 4K gaming performance and is designed to handle the demands of the latest AAA games and VR experiences with ease.

name: Core i7-11700K 8C/16T (No needs GPU)
description: The Intel Core i7-11700K is a high-performance desktop processor from Intel's Rocket Lake series, designed for gaming, content creation, and multitasking. It features 8 cores and 16 threads, providing excellent performance in both single-threaded and multi-threaded applications. With a base clock of 3.6 GHz and a boost clock that can reach up to 5.0 GHz, it offers substantial speed for demanding tasks. The processor includes 16 MB of L3 cache, enhancing its ability to handle large amounts of data efficiently.

name: Ryzen 9 5900X 12C/24T (Need GPU)
description: The AMD Ryzen 9 5900X is a high-performance desktop processor based on AMD's Zen 3 architecture. It features 12 cores and 24 threads, providing excellent multi-threaded performance for demanding applications such as video editing, 3D rendering, and gaming. With a base clock of 3.7 GHz and a maximum boost clock of up to 4.8 GHz, it delivers strong single-core performance as well. The processor includes a substantial 6 MB of L2 cache and 64 MB of L3 cache, ensuring efficient data handling and reduced latency. Its TDP is 105W, making it power-efficient for its performance level. The Ryzen 9 5900X supports PCIe 4.0, enabling faster data transfer rates with compatible hardware, and has memory support for DDR4-3200. Designed for the AM4 socket, it is compatible with a wide range of motherboards, making it a versatile choice for high-end desktops.

name: Core i3-14100F 4C/8T (Needs GPU)
description: The Intel Core i3-14100F is a 14th generation desktop processor based on the Comet Lake architecture. It features 4 cores and 8 threads, delivering solid performance for everyday computing tasks and light gaming. With a base clock speed of 3.5 GHz and a maximum turbo frequency of 4.3 GHz, it offers a balance between performance and power efficiency. The i3-14100F comes with 12 MB of Intel Smart Cache and supports both DDR4 and DDR5 memory, ensuring compatibility with modern systems. It lacks integrated graphics, necessitating a discrete GPU for display output and graphics processing. This makes it an ideal choice for budget-conscious users building a system with a separate graphics card.

name: Core i9-12900K 16C/32T (No needs GPU)
description: The Intel Core i9-12900K is a high-end desktop processor from Intel's Alder Lake family, designed for enthusiasts and power users. It features a hybrid architecture with 16 cores, comprising 8 Performance-cores and 8 Efficiency-cores, and supports 24 threads. The processor boasts a base clock speed of 3.2 GHz for Performance-cores and 2.4 GHz for Efficiency-cores, with a maximum turbo frequency of 5.2 GHz. It includes 30 MB of L3 cache and has a TDP of 125W. The i9-12900K supports the latest DDR5 memory and PCIe 5.0, providing high bandwidth for memory and peripherals. It also comes with integrated Intel UHD Graphics 770, eliminating the need for a dedicated GPU for basic graphical tasks. This processor is ideal for gaming, content creation, and demanding computing tasks.
